Graziano, A

Boerr, L A
Bai, J C
Corti, R E
metadata.dc:description: Fifteen patients suffering from inflamatory diseases of the colon (14 nonspecific ulcerous recto colitis and 1 Crohn disease) were complicated with involvement of large joints and spine (ankylosing spondelytis). The clinic, radiology, pathology, seriology and evolution of ankylosing spondylitis were considered in relation-ship with inflamatory disease of colon.
metadata.dc:title: Osteo-artropat√≠as de las enfermedades inflamatorias del colon.
[Osteoarthropathies of inflammatory diseases of the colon].
